title: Proof-004 — MaMeeFarm™ Garden Environment Evidence

description.en: Afternoon garden observation at MaMeeFarm™. Cool air, cloudy sky, and natural farm conditions recorded as part of the continuous Real-Work Data Proof series.

notes: Automatically logged into the Proof Registry via the new MaMeeFarm™ Data System.
This proof marks the beginning of structured environment tracking for the farm.
